name: My LoL Ranked Stats
body:
With Lol Ranked Stats you can easy and simply check your ranked basic stats


![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24874748/Screen_1.png)




Check your last 50 ranked matches

![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24874748/Screen_2.png)




You can get the detailed of your matches, your items, champions, KDA

![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24874748/Screen_3.png)




and also your farm progression, and damage done in each match

![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24874748/Screen_4.png)




Check the results with the champions who you more used in recent matches, to see with which champions has more success on your play style.

![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24874748/Screen_5.png)




Internet connection required only once, then you can see your stats as often as you like, anywhere.


All with free app available on Android on January '16.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
